Initial Description: [quote]I'm here to have fun|and fight monsters!||Back home[;] I love|working out[;] long walks|on the beach[;] and|working out![quote]
Middle Description: [quote]Woah[;] this is|exhausting! It turns|out you CAN get|too much exercise.||But hey[;] fighting|monsters is still fun![quote]
Endgame Description: [quote]Look[;] I do really|want super-strength|and a monster truck[;]|but maybe we could|all just go home|some time?[quote]
Post Endgame Description: [quote]We defeated Lady Luck[;]|so I'm just having fun|now! Having fun and|staying hydrated!||Fighting monsters is an|amazing workout![quote]
